data.comment: B. Munich kick-off the first half - the match is underway!
Corner awarded to Schalke.
In the minute 2, Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to B. Munich's area.
Throw-in high up the field for Schalke in Munich.
B. Munich needs to be cautious. Schalke have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Schalke close to the penalty box.
Schalke have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 4, B. Munich take a 1-0 lead thanks to Serge Gnabry.
Great play from Joshua Kimmich to set up the goal.
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 6, B. Munich's Jerome Boateng gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Felix Zwayer awards Schalke a goal kick.
Throw-in B. Munich.
In the minute 7, B. Munich drive forward but Robert Lewandowski is judged offside.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Schalke in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke's Goncalo Paciencia gets in a shot but it is blocked by a B. Munich defender.
In the minute 13, B. Munich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
In the minute 15, Can B. Munich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Schalke's half?
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke just outside B. Munich's area.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 19, Goal! B. Munich extend their lead to 2-0 through Leon Goretzka.
That's a fine assist from Thomas Muller.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 20, Free kick B. Munich.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich in their own half.
B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski breaks free at Allianz Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Schalke at Allianz Arena.
Felix Zwayer signals a Schalke throw-in in B. Munich's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 24, B. Munich drives forward and Joshua Kimmich gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for B. Munich in Munich.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Felix Zwayer waits before resuming play because Suat Serdar for Schalke is still down.
B. Munich have been given a penalty at Allianz Arena...
Ozan Kabak is booked for the away team.
In the minute 30, The away team has substituted Suat Serdar with Alessandro Schopf. David Wagner is thus making his first change.
Goal! Robert Lewandowski extends B. Munich's lead from the spot. They now lead 3-0.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 35, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 37, B. Munich's Robert Lewandowski is whistled for offside at Allianz Arena.
Throw-in for B. Munich close to the penalty box.
Can B. Munich capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Schalke's half?
In the minute 41, Free kick for B. Munich in the half of Schalke.
Niklas Sule hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for B. Munich!
Leon Goretzka for B. Munich drives towards goal at Allianz Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Schalke at Allianz Arena.
B. Munich are pushing forward but Serge Gnabry's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
In the minute 43, Schalke have a goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Schalke, close to B. Munich's area.
In the minute 45, Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Munich.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Felix Zwayer blows to end the first-half.
Schalke kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Throw-in Schalke.
In the minute 46, Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
Felix Zwayer signals a Schalke throw-in in B. Munich's half.
Great finish from Serge Gnabry to give B. Munich a 4-0 lead.
In the minute 47, Leroy Sane with an assist there.
Schalke awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
Goal kick for Schalke at Allianz Arena.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Schalke.
In the minute 51, Corentin Tolisso is on a sub for Leon Goretzka for B. Munich.
Free kick for Schalke in their own half.
Schalke awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Schalke have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Throw-in for B. Munich in their own half.
Corner awarded to B. Munich.
In the minute 55, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Schalke in their own half.
Throw-in for B. Munich at Allianz Arena.
Can Schalke get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in B. Munich's half?
In the minute 59, Serge Gnabry puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 5-0.
Leroy Sane instrumental with a fine assist.
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to B. Munich.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
B. Munich are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 62, Felix Zwayer awards Schalke a goal kick.
B. Munich pushes forward through Corentin Tolisso, whose finish on goal is saved.
B. Munich's Leroy Sane is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 63, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
B. Munich have a dangerous throw-in.
Robert Lewandowski for the home team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 65, B. Munich's Joshua Kimmich has been booked in Munich.
The away team replace Rabbi Matondo with Benito Raman.
B. Munich to take a throw-in in Schalke territory.
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to B. Munich.
B. Munich attack but Corentin Tolisso's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Schalke goal kick.
In the minute 69, Schalke needs to be cautious. B. Munich have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Schalke.
Goal! Thomas Muller extends B. Munich's lead to 6-0.
In the minute 69, Great play from Robert Lewandowski to set up the goal.
B. Munich take a comfortable 7-0 lead thanks to Leroy Sane.
Joshua Kimmich instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Leroy Sane with Mickael Cuisance. This is the second substitution made today by Hans-Dieter Flick.
B. Munich make their third substitution with Chris Richards replacing Jerome Boateng.
Hans-Dieter Flick (B. Munich) is making a fourth substitution, with Jamal Musiala replacing Serge Gnabry.
In the minute 74, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In Munich Schalke's Mark Uth is caught offside.
Benito Raman for Schalke is whistled offside.
In the minute 78, B. Munich have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Ball safe as Schalke is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Steven Skrzybski is replacing Goncalo Paciencia for Schalke at Allianz Arena.
In the minute 79, David Wagner is making the team's fourth substitution at Allianz Arena with Timo Becker replacing Amine Harit.
Free kick for B. Munich in their own half.
Free kick for Schalke in the half of B. Munich.
Benito Raman for Schalke gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
B. Munich have a goal kick.
In the minute 81, At Allianz Arena, Benjamin Stambouli has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 81, Jamal Musiala puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 8-0.
Robert Lewandowski with an assist there.
Joshua Zirkzee is replacing Thomas Muller for the home team.
In the minute 83, Felix Zwayer signals a B. Munich throw-in in Schalke's half.
Throw-in for B. Munich in the half of Schalke.
Free kick B. Munich.
In the minute 84, B. Munich are coming forward and Joshua Kimmich gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Munich.
Throw-in B. Munich.
In the minute 88, Felix Zwayer awards Schalke a goal kick.
Mark Uth of Schalke is pulled up for offside.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 8-0.
